column4: when i try to install java it says "couldn't find sun-j2re1.5" but i have it on my desktop. ideas?
did you cd to ~/Desktop before running dpkg -i sun-jre*
no. how do i do that?
open a terminal and type cd ~/Desktop
i got the package from ubotu and followed the instructions but it still says "couldn't find package sun-j2re1.5" and i cd to desktop. ideas?
but you may be doing something other than what I'm thinking of
it means you probably need different instructions
do you know anything else i can do to get java?
this is specifically for Hoary... http://ubuntuguide.org/#jre
but It's probably just a good idea to upgrade to breezy anyway
i followed those instructions but it didn't work yet. should i get breezy?
I'd suggest doing that. It'll probably be easier in the long run
do u know how to get breezy?
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade I think will work
